home.title: Welcome to {theme} Theme
home.subtitle: A beautiful mobile-first application with dark pink theming and responsive navigation.

mobileFirst.title: Mobile First
mobileFirst.description: Responsive design that works perfectly on all devices with a mobile-first approach.

darkPinkTheme.title: Dark Pink Theme

modernStack.title: Modern Stack
modernStack.description: Built with SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, and modern web technologies.

about.title: About Us
about.description: This is a modern web application built with SvelteKit and TailwindCSS, featuring a beautiful dark pink theme and mobile-first responsive design.
about.missionText: To create beautiful, accessible, and performant web applications that delight users across all devices and platforms.
